actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: _Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Sling
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 4 (1d4+2) bludgeoning damage.

bonus_actions.name: Scurry
bonus_actions.desc: The kobold moves up to 15 feet without provoking opportunity attacks. If the kobold is aware of traps in the area, the kobold can choose if this movement triggers any of them.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The kobold has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, and its Perception is 3 when perceiving by sight.
